artist: Artist: Josh Simmons; Publisher: Top Shelf Productions, Marietta, Ga.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, screenprinted illustration of a chicken, designs, and text on wove paper covers; 32 pp.
inscription: Inside of front cover, black ink pen: FLY - / ENJOY! / from / JOSH SIMMONS
title: Cirkus New Orleans
